text: Kenneth Spicer Wherry (February 28, 1892November 29, 1951) was an American businessman, attorney, and politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was a U.S. Senator from Nebraska from 1943 until his death in 1951. He was the minority leader for the last two years. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1951 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War I Category:Lawyers from Nebraska Category:Businesspeople from Nebraska Category:United States senators from Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Minority leaders of the United States Senate Category:Military people from Nebraska
title: Kenneth S. Wherry
